name: Logan Scanlon
text:
This particular location stands out from the others. The staff are all very happy to serve you and the trivia Tuesday night guy is hilarious and entertaining.
Tons of vegan options now, even vegan mayo and cheeses. ‚Ä¶More

name: Niner Mike
text: Very decent pizza and beer selection.   Reasonable prices and friendly staff.   I love to come here to share a quick bite and grab a cold one.

name: Gregory Mullen
text: I admire this restaurant a lot. It has a happy feeling. The meals are tasty. the service is effective and the team is polite. The pay is honest. very much recommend.

name: Gerald Strohacker
text: Good food. When we first got there seemed like we were a bother to our waitress. However, she made up for it by making sure our drinks never got empty, which is a huge pet peeve of mine. Little expensive for pizza, 2 large pizzas bread ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Khan
text: We really really love this place! Food is delicious, especially the Mellow Chicken Salad sandwich. We haven‚Äôt had a dish here that we didn‚Äôt absolutely enjoy. Pizza, salads, appetizers...everything is amazing! Place is clean and the service ‚Ä¶More

name: Heather Bagenstos
text: Food was amazing. Our server Sam helped us puck our pizza. He was very knowledgeable about the menu!!! On top of everything, one of the best dinning experiences I've had. He is super sweet and I will always ask for him!

name: Rachel Myers
text: Delicious pizza combinations and good drink menu. You can concoct a pretty amazing vegan pizza here. They use Daiya cheese for vegan options.

name: Charles Keen
text: Solid pizza! One of my favorite pizza spots for sure. I never feel greasy or anything from there pizzas and I tried a good 5-6 different pies so far. Quality has been top notch on toppings and bread. I really like their sauce but that's ‚Ä¶More

name: Yogi Brauss
text:
We love this place !!!
We've been coming for over a year now and have never left unhappy. The staff make the place more inviting. The pies are exceptional and better than any pizza we've ever tried. 5 star++

name: Michael Canton
text: Amazing service and top notch food. The pretzel bites with beer cheese dip and the pizza were incredible. Cool location just outside the mall area. Will definitely be back to try more of the vast menu. New dessert options include gourmet pops. Highly recommended!

name: Yori Berlinski
text: I love Mellow Mushroom Alex and Josh took care of me and it was great. Their pizzas are amazing and the atmosphere is awesome. Plenty of drink choices plus great service. I will be back

name: Kathy Tabor
text: Great place, great people, great food. We had a fabulous meal, Alex our server was wonderful.We'd never been there before so we tried mushroom soup, followed by ‚Ä¶More

name: Casandra Tanenbaum
text: I am a big fan of mellow everywhere, but this location is friendly, courteous, affordable, and doubly delicious! I held my birthday dinner here and was supremely delighted with the service and the smiles and of course the pizza! Kean is of course the man but all the servers are great. Thanks Mellow!

name: Kathy Tabor
text: Great place, great people, great food. We had a fabulous meal, Alex our server was wonderful.We'd never been there before so we tried mushroom soup, followed by pizza: half a Mellow Mushroom, half a custom combination from the large list of ‚Ä¶More

name: Maria Manosis
text: Had a steak sandwich. It is was great.  Not a Philly but didn't claim to be

name: Rebecca Torriani
text: The staff at Mellow Mushroom were absolutely amazing! Especially our server Abbey, she was very patient, caring and took time to really give exceptional customer service to our family throughout our time at Mellow Mushroom. She deserves a raise! ü§ó

name: Kelly Dibilio
text: The food is fine, but the five-stars is more for Abby than anything else. She has the BEST personality, and is incredibly helpful. I would recommend her time and time again.

name: Tanya Riley
text: Quick service with our server Abbey! She was an absolute doll. Highly recommend her and the cosmic karma pizza!

name: Robert McDermott
text: Nice and hot. Great dough to dip in the greek dressing.

name: Coach M
text: The pizza is outstanding,  the sandwiches are also good.  Solid drink menu,  and pretty good service.

name: Neek G
text: Great place for date night and family. Ask for the waiter Sam he‚Äôs great! Staff is friendly and the place is always clean.

name: kristina villardi
text:
Excellent food & customer service!
Love the Italian hoagie . Everything we have tried is awesome... we will def be back!

name: roger roque
text: Very friendly environment. Their non traditional gourmet pizzas were amazing. Their beer cheese  Dipping sauce with garlic bread was also amazing. Staff was very courteous and pretty quick despite our large group. Would definitely recommend.  I would certainly eat there again.

name: Stephan ORourke
text: This mellow mushroom is by far the best. We frequent this location because of Nina and the rest of the staff. Nina at the bar always greets us with a genuine smile and warm heyyyyy. The food is great..staff is always friendly..stop in for some good eats..and just a nice laid back time where the bartender remembers you..Thanks Nina ....

name: Sarah Auden
text: Sam was an amazing waiter when we brought our family in a few months ago. My son has special needs and needs a lot of attention in public spaces. He was not the best behaved that night, but Sam was patient with us while we dealt with him, ‚Ä¶More

name: Oswaldo Loor
text: Always a hit at Mellow. The service from Abby was amazing. Very friendly and attentive and the food was definitely awesome. Cannot go round with a good mello mushroom pizza!!! Kids were definitely excited when we said let's have pizza at Mellow!! üëçüèΩüòâüçïüçï

text: Love this place. Amazing food and super friendly and kind waitress. Thank you Abby for everything. 5 stars for sure

text: Pizza and salad were really great. Decent service as well üòÄ. Order the pizza extra crispy, you won't be disappointed.

text: Abbey was fabulous. The food was awesome! Pizza was delicious and salad so fresh and delicious. But I must say Abbey our server made the meal and experience top notch. Give that women a raise!!

name: Nicholas Pavlinsky
text: Great pizza. I love the whole grain crust, they make a good Greek salad as well. Only downside is the wait for the food is usually pretty long. 40-50 min for a pizza. I would give 5 stars if the service was a bit faster.

name: Forrest Gerstner
text: Fantastic food, great staff and of course we love the good vibes of mellow mushroom. The Great White pizza is to die for. Keep up the great work gang.

name: Kimberly Campbell
text: Fast, friendly service and yummy food. We will definitely return in the near future.

name: Christopher Cusimano
text: We haven‚Äôt been to a Mellow Mushroom in a very long time and  we have been missing out.  The pretzel bites app was delicious and their pizza was very very good.  Our server Ashlee was also fantastic and attentive to details.  Great time!

name: Emily Izquierdo
text: Shannon and the tall new guy are great!! Had a great experience. Love coming to this place. Great happy hour.

name: Anne Edwards
text: Great food. The cheesy pesto bread was delicious! I ordered a sausagefest calsone and it was HUGE!!! Big enough for me and my daughter to split and very good. The half hoagie was also big and tasted great. The mighty meat pizza was awesome. The sauce is delicious!

name: Ayo Stephenson
text: Great food and great service from the bar tonight. Ordered the Shiitake pizza. Fast cooking time

name: Evan Talbert
text: Juan was a great server. We chose the ‚Äúgreat white‚Äù pizza and it did not disappoint. Minimal flop and a nice crispy crust- a solid ratio of ingredients resulted in a tasty pie. Would return.

text: food was amazing, atmosphere is lively, service was impeccable, overall outstanding !! my server, abby, was speedy, kind, and exceedingly efficient. i couldn‚Äôt of asked for better service or a better dinner. i recommend mellow mushroom to ‚Ä¶More

text: I LOVE THIS MELLOW! It‚Äôs so close to my home and my family go here all the time. They‚Äôve got a great trivia on Tuesday nights and an awesome happy hour. Last time I sat at the bar for lunch and my service was amazing. The bartender shannon was on point and recommended the lunch special which was quick and a great price.

name: Dean Christie
text: This place gave my kid his first taste of pizza. He has an egg and dairy allergy and they have a pizza with vegan cheese that he enjoyed and it was really good.

name: D. Merritt
text: My family loves this place! The bartender really knows what he's doing. Makes his own bitters! Hard to find that. The pizzas fantastic the wings are good, very friendly people never had a long wait time. Definitely recommend if you haven't been yet.

name: Jeremy Maxaner
text: Great food and great service! I would highly recommend this Mellow Mushroom location. Ask for Abby! She is the best server üòé

name: Andrew Ledezma
text: My family and I dine here pretty regularly and never had an issue. Love the vibe. One of the few places where you can even find a vegan pie. Abby is a very courteous and friendly waiter

name: Luke Walkinshaw
text: Great experience! Server was super attentive and excellent! Had pepperoni and sausage and it was awesome

name: Andrew Loy
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of the premium alternative pizza houses in the land. Throw out your preconceptions of what a pizza should be, and expand your mind to the possibilities of what it COULD be! Groovy atmosphere, open kitchen (so you can watch the masters at work), and a lovely wait staff makes this place a home run.

name: Nicole Liskowitz
text: Went last night with family. Sam was our server. So AMAZING! Ask for him when dining there!

name: Nikolas Denham
text: Local Mellow Mushroom located in the heart Wellington.  They offer an affordable menu that isn‚Äôt just for pizza lovers with awesome bruschetta and steak sandwiches.  Also pet friendly which is why I can easily give them 5 stars.

name: Amy
text: Had Sam as our waiter and he was spectacular. Great trivia on Tuesday night! They have great specials all week and food wise, there is something for everyone.

name: elizmots
text: Love the variety of beers and the enormous pizza menu. Love their happy hour and their pretzel bites are delicious. Wish it came with more beer cheese... too small for my liking cause it‚Äôs delicious. The calzones are loaded Inside. My favorite pizza is the mighty meat. Yum!

name: Amanda Molina

name: Ashley Cruz
text: This place is okay. The staff is very nice and the restaurant is clean. I remember the pizza being much better so I was honestly a little disappointed. Definitely better places in the area for pizza. ‚Ä¶More
